div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1627 Gaza region, Judaea, about 1940 Burial: 50-30 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 400 AR Ascalon: tetradr. (including one with portrait of Cleopatra VII, recorded yrs. 21, 25, 33, 34, 40, 41) Disposition: A. Spaer, Jerusalem 6; private coll., Jerusalem 6; private coll., Tel Aviv 20 Information from A. Spaer
